alert.note: Alert for Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:33PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Spartanburg County through 700 PM EDT... At 633 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Spartanburg, or near Roebuck, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roebuck and Moore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
